name: qrkata-chat
description: Chat moderno estilo Discord con React, Node.js y MongoDB

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm run test-db
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.deploy:check: npm run test-db && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: cd client && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd client && npm install -g netlify-cli && netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.deploy:vercel: cd client && npm install -g vercel && vercel --prod
